A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I actually think all of the negative reviews of this one were wrong...I haven’t been a fan of any modern Star Wars movie and\, like any intelligent human\, I know Star Trek is far superior franchise\, but this movie is the best of the modern films. It’s nicely filmed\, the derivative story was still interesting\, and it was worth seeing in the big screen. No doubt that the movie was too long and “Ben Solo” is a weak villain\, but this is a Saturday popcorn space serial - no more and no less - and I didn’t feel ripped off.
